snippet: Crumbs shut its doors on Monday. But on Thursday, it was said to be close to securing financing from a group of investors, including Marcus Lemonis, star of the CNBC reality show “The Profit,” about saving small businesses.
abstract: Crumbs shut its doors on Monday. But on Thursday, it was said to be close to securing financing from a group of investors, including Marcus Lemonis, star of the CNBC reality show “The Profit,” about saving small businesses.

headline.main: Crumbs Cupcakes May Live Another Day
